text:
Trulia Rentals | Real Estate, Payments | Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer | ONSITE (SF) VISA | Full-time | Salary Equity Full Benefits

We're a nimble team building brand new services in the rentals space designed to make the process of renting your home easier for renters and landlords. Or, demystifying as described by the Verge: https://www.theverge.com/2018/7/31/17634762/zillow-apartment.... We develop products to delight our users, and I think the numbers speak for themselves: 56 million visits over the last 6 months as reported by SimilarWeb.

Our stack includes Java, MySQL, Node and React. If you're interested in trying something new, apply here: https://www.zillow.com/careers/jobs/trulia/openings/?j=P1218...

Make sure to check out our reviews on Glassdoor: https://www.glassdoor.com/Reviews/Trulia-Reviews-E226815.htm More about what it's like to work here at: https://on.trulia.com/2yIpjit
